abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews etchings by Francisco de Goya y Lucientes at Nassau County Museum of Art in Roslyn Harbor (Metropolitan/Long Island).
snippet: The Nassau County Museum of Art is displaying work of Francisco Goya from a period when it took a disturbing turn, possibly the result of illness.
lead_paragraph: The Nassau County Museum of Art is displaying work of Francisco Goya from a period when it took a disturbing turn, possibly the result of illness.

headline.main: Goya’s Dark Etchings From a Past Full of Horrors
headline.print_headline: Goya’s Dark Etchings From a Past Full of Horrors
headline.seo: Goya’s Etchings of a Dark and Complicated Past
